ActJudges Act
SubjectKatherine Anne Marie Jones ** ANNUITY ** The Hon. Malachi Cornelius Jones **
PrecisGranting of an ANNUITY to KATHERINE ANNE MARIE JONES, survivor of the Hon. Malachi Cornelius Jones, a Judge of the Court of Appeal of Nova Scotia, effective June 28, 2013.
